welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vale de Cambra, a charming city known for its stunning views and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our rich culture, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viseu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Viseu Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and some charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
